bibl.title: Persuasion and Dissuasion in Early Christianity, Ancient Judaism, and Hellenism
bibl.seg: SCHIMANOWSKI Gottfried, Der Aristeasbrief zwischen Abgrenzung und Selbstdarstellung.

P.W. VAN DER HORST, M.J.J. MENKEN, J.F.M. SMIT and G. VAN OYEN (Edd.), Persuasion and Dissuasion in Early Christianity, Ancient Judaism, and Hellenism = Contributions to Biblical Exegesis and Theology. 33 (Leuven, 2003) pp. 45-64.
